DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Concurrent Medication : Allowed : Prophylaxis AIDSrelated opportunistic infection . Supportive therapy , medication nausea , vomit , anemia , analgesia . Patients must : HIV infection . CD4 count 100 500 cells/mm3 . At least two palpable lymph node . Plasma viremia . No CURRENT AIDSdefining condition . No prior antiretroviral treatment . Exclusion Criteria Concurrent Medication : Excluded first 8 week study : Other antiretroviral agent . Steroids . Interleukins . Interferons . Cytotoxic chemotherapy . Prior Medication : Excluded : Prior antiretroviral therapy . Prior cytotoxic chemotherapy . Acute therapy infection another medical illness within 14 day prior study entry .
